channel.title: Client Crash When i Walk [ help ]
channel.description:
Ok so im using hybrid pvps source and when i open client and i have the server and everything online, i go to click somewhere it logs me out instantly and sends a error through the client loader. Idk how to fix. anyone care to tell me how to fix? Or show?
'Hybrid-Pvp' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Map Amount: 1226 508 Object Amount: 38424 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 97,253,253 - 2,0,0 - 67,98, 1490 1486 2183 2707 845 2710 2109 2428 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d76, pid=3088, t id=2132 # # JRE version: 6.0_15-b03 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.1-b02 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d76] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Wolf\Desktop\Client Of HyBriD PvP\hs_err_pid3088.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Client Crash When i Walk [ help ]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

try updating JAVA JRE and JDK

you have:
JRE version: 6.0_15-b03

the newest one is
JRE version: 7.0_02

your like 15 versions behind.

Read full topic
